original_text: From all the gifts that the people give to you, you must make separate every offering that the Lord should have. The best part of each gift is the part that you must make separate for the Lord.”
korean_text: 너희가 받은 모든 헌물 중에서 너희는 그 아름다운 것 곧 거룩하게 한 부분을 가져다가 여호와께 거제로 드릴지니라

sentences.original_text: From all the gifts that the people give to you
you must make separate every offering
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 모든 헌물을 따로 구별해야 하며

sentences.original_text: The best part of each gift
is the part that you must make separate for the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 너가 주를 위해 따로 구별해야 할 부분이다
